name: Kaldan Samudhra
about: Kaldan is located on the beautiful shores of Bay of Bengal, 2 Kms before the Temple city of Mahabalipuram. With its 106 luxurious rooms, suites and villas Kaldan is ready to welcome and treat you as Kings and Queens of the Palace.       With largest swimming pool, sprawling infinite lawns merging into the private beach, curated unique experiences and global choice of cuisines, Kaldan has something to offer to ensure your well-earned holiday is a memorable one with your friends and families.

name: Sheraton
about: Whether you're in Chennai for business or leisure, you're always assured of a first-class stay at Four Points by Sheraton Mahabalipuram Resort & Convention Center. Conveniently located on the East Coast Road (ECR), our hotel is moments from Shore Temple, the beach and top area attractions. Settle into contemporary hotel rooms with free Wi-Fi, pillowtop beds, private balconies and flat-screen TVs. Our upgraded resort suites offer refreshing plunge pools. Begin or end your day in Chennai at Petals, our onsite restaurant featuring an all-day buffet and a la carte dining. Stop by Nectar - The Lounge Bar - to unwind with a cocktail in the evening. As one of Chennai's premier hotel destinations for meetings and events, you'll enjoy over 90,000 square feet of venue space with a capacity to accommodate 5,000 guests, as well as great catering and award-winning service. Find everything you need for a successful travel experience at Four Points by Sheraton Mahabalipuram Resort & Convention Center.

name: welcom resort
about: Good service quality, good food, good rooms, good stay experience and good place are some highly appreciated and talked about aspects of the The Welcome Resort. With an overall rating of 4.4 out of 5 (108 Ratings), the property is rated very good by 55% of the guests, 29% have rated it good, 11% have rated it average and 5% have rated it as bad. Also, we recommend that guests must go through traveller reviews and ratings posted by fellow travellers on the Goibibo platform to ensure that The Welcome Resort is best suited for them. For more detailed information about this resort, you can check the Questions & Answers section as well on Goibibo. There you can find the answers of the questions asked by some of our users about this property.Safety And Hygiene is the top priority for the The Welcome Resort with score 67%. 46% Guests like the Thermal Screening feature. Staff Hygiene feature is liked by 59% users. Social Distancing is also followed by the staff of The Welcome Resort the score for this feature is 64%. The Welcome Resort Amenities are liked by the 100% of guest.

name: gem park
about: Overlooking the beautiful Nilgiris Mountain, the hotel stands tall with all elegance and style. A contemporary structure with a traditional feel, Gem Park Ooty has kept itself well with the spirit of the beautiful and picturesque city. It is located in the heart of the town, minute away from key tourist attractions and major shopping area. With its convenient location and fine service, the hotel has aptly gained favour of all business and leisure travellers who throng the city throughout the year. The hotel welcomes you to a stunning beautifully done up lobby with impressive Indian art on the wall. It is the spotlessly attired staff, ever ready to do the most to make you comfortable that makes the stay an experience for a lifetime.

name: zostel
about: Situated in the lap of nature, Zostel Ooty is a backpacker hostel that allows you to mingle with fellow travellers over bonfires & hikes. Set amid rolling hills with views of Doddabetta Mountain, this modest hostel is only 2.8 km from Ooty's Government Rose Garden and is 5 minutes walk from Ooty main bus stand/railway station. Nestled in the Blue Mountains of the Nilgiris, Ootacumund or Ooty stands at over 2,200 meters and has all the staples of a charming hill station. With a variety of dormitories, we have plenty of places where travellers can mingle apart from the cosy common rooms. Mixed-gender dorms and Female dorm rooms feature 6-10-12 Bunk beds, a locker for each bed, Wi-fi, shared washrooms, home-cooked food (on demand), and en-suite facilities. There are also cosy private rooms in the quaint, scenic backpacker hostel above Nilgiri range. It is a travellers' den to feel & explore the beauty of Ooty and places around.

name: la blooms
about: La Blooms is a good choice for travellers looking for a budget accomodation in Ooty. It is located in Thalayathimund.This Hotel stands out as one of the highly recommended hotel in Ooty and is recommended by 90% of our guests. Hotel is rated 3.7 out of 5, which is considered as good. The property enjoys a great location advantage and provides easy and fast connectivity to the major transit points of the city. Some of the popular transit points from La Blooms are ATC Bus Stand (3.7 kms), Ooty sightseeing taxi service (4.3 kms) and Ooty Bus Station (4.6 kms). The Hotel is in proximity to some popular tourist attractions and other places of interest in Ooty. Some of the tourist attractions near La Blooms Sacred Heart Church (3.5 kms) and St. Joseph Church (4.6 kms).

name: Mariott
about: Discover five-star hotel amenities in a beautiful beach setting at Goa Marriott Resort & Spa. Situated on the edge of Miramar Beach, with picturesque views of the Arabian Sea and Mandovi River, our luxury hotel blends relaxing resort services with award-winning hospitality.Settle into well-appointed rooms and suites with sweeping views of the bay or the hotel gardens.Taste the flavors of Goa and the world in our restaurants and bars, including a swim-up bar in our outdoor pool.Treat yourself to pampering at our spa, take a yoga class at our 24-hour fitness center or simply relax in a hammock.Our elegant indoor and outdoor venues offer the perfect setting for business events and weddings, with customized catering and personalized service.

name: Taj
about: Explore the horizon beyond the 16th century ramparts of the Portuguese Fort.The first luxury hotel in Goa on Candolim Beach offers rooms, suites, villas, twin luxury of hillside and sea-facing residences across a turquoise-washed paradise with splendid views of the Arabian Sea.Soak in a space that displays the spirit of Goa!

name: grand dragon
about: Established in the year 2007, The Grand Dragon Ladakh, one of the first 5 star hotels in Leh Ladakh, is owned and operated by the Abdu family from Leh, who have more than 40 years of experience welcoming visitors to the beautiful region. It is decorated magnificently with handmade paintings by Gulam Mustafa (First modern Artist of Ladakh) around every corner, and fixtures that are reminiscent of royalty.
